name: Container Inspection
description: Standard inspection workflow for export containers

steps.title: Container Exterior Inspection
steps.instructions: Check the exterior of the container for any damages, rust, or structural issues. Take photos of all four sides.

steps.title: Container Number Verification
steps.instructions: Verify the container number matches the shipping documents. Take a clear photo of the container number.

steps.title: Door Seal Check
steps.instructions: Check that the container seal is intact and matches the seal number on the documentation. Take a close-up photo of the seal.

steps.title: Interior Inspection
steps.instructions: Check the interior of the container for cleanliness, damages, and any potential issues that could affect cargo.

steps.title: Ventilation Check
steps.instructions: For ventilated containers, ensure all ventilation mechanisms are working properly.
